name.ja: ヴァルモニカ・シェルタ

text.en:
Apply 1 of these effects (your opponent's choice, if you do not have a "Valmonica" card in your Pendulum Zone).
● Gain 500 LP, then you can place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck, and if you do, draw 2 cards.
● Take 500 damage, then you can add 1 "Valmonica" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, except "Valmonica Scelta".
You can only activate 1 "Valmonica Scelta" per turn.
